mapper.select:
select bno, bcate, btitle, bwriter, bdate, bupdatedate, bview, blike, breplycnt from (select /*+INDEX_DESC(board pk_board) */ rownum rn, bno, bcate, btitle, bwriter, bdate, bupdatedate, bview, blike, breplycnt from board where
rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}) where rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
mapper.insert: insert into board(bno, uno, bcate, btitle, bwriter, bdate, bcontent, breplycnt) values(seq_bno.nextval, #{uno}, #{bcate}, #{btitle}, #{bwriter}, sysdate, #{bcontent}, #{breplycnt})
mapper.update: update board set btitle = #{btitle}, bcate = #{bcate}, bcontent = #{bcontent}, bupdatedate = sysdate where bno = #{bno}
update board set bview = bview+1 where bno = #{bno}
update board set blike = #{blike} where bno = #{bno}
update board set breplycnt = breplycnt + #{amount} where bno = #{bno}
update board set breplycnt = (select count(*) from boardreply where bno = #{bno}) where bno = #{bno}
